name: David Lynch Teaches Typing
description:
That typing tutor you like is coming is coming back in style!

Help raise your words per minute with the only software that's wild at heart and weird on the top, David Lynch Teaches Typing.

In the full version you will learn
- Homerow
- Upper Row
- Lower Row
- Number Pad
And more!

*David Lynch Voice is impersonated. This game is a parody and in no way endorsed or affiliated with the real David Lynch
